responsibilities: Responsible for gathering, documenting, and analyzing business needs and requirements in CVS Agile. Worked on creating all the project documentation like Features, epics and User stories. Defined Business Rules by interacting with stakeholders and users through Surveys & Brainstorming. Conducted Joint Application Development (JAD) sessions. Performed Gap Analysis, conducted walkthroughs and acted as a liaison between the business users, stakeholders and the team to perform requirements, quality and risk analysis. Lead the requirements for a project on Health Rules Provider (HRP) Reimbursement (Pricing) and 3M Grouper. Developed relationship and acted as back-up liaison with payers, providers and facilities regarding Utilization Management (UM) policies and procedures. Complied with established policies, procedures, and implements appropriate changes to the Utilization Management process as directed. Acted as an interface with different stakeholders of the project. Developed a vision plan that defined the primary goals and objectives of the project. Worked primarily on the projects related to RxCLAIM, Adjudication, Pricing, Accums, Eligibility, R&R, EAS, CET, EOB, PCRS, Med-D, PDE, CDH, Extract, SBO's etc. Also contributed to business process re-engineering for Paper Claims & Benefits. Environment: Agile, JIRA; HL7, Mainframe ; Business intelligence (BI), Business Objects (BO), Requisite Pro, MS Visio, MS Project, SQL, MS Access, MS Office.

Worked on the Tabula Rasa and DaVita integration project phase 1, phase 2 and enhancements. Interviewed SMEs and Stakeholders to get a better understanding of client business processes and gather Business requirements. Conducted the requirements sessions around which IKC patient population/demographics to be sent to Tabula Rasa as well as Surescripts for RX Script alerting. Worked on IKC Roster business rules around payor programs, disease states, etc. and the patient population that needs to be sent to the Clients. Got familiar with HealtheAnalytics to run any SQL queries and fetch data. Documented requirements in Confluence around the Data Elements which have different file formats. Created Data Mappings from HealtheIntent table structure to Tabula Rasa patient roster flat file format/specification. Provided detailed guidelines on the process for on-boarding new payor programs and around payor inclusion/exclusion criteria. In phase 2 of the project worked on the requirements for a process that is needed in order to automate the Medication Action Plan, Prescriber Action, and Medication Profile Report (documents) from Tabula Rasa to Cerner Millennium and notify end user when a document has been uploaded via Millennium Message Center. Also created use cases for an automated process which was needed for the facilitation of Tabula Rasa MSR (Med Safety Reviews) from Tabula Rasa to Cerner HealtheIntent platform. This was to eliminate any manual sending of these reports as well as drive end user workflows and provide substantial data reporting on high risk patients through HealtheRecord, HealtheRegistries, and the Longitudinal Record. Environment: MS Visio, MS Project, SQL, MS Access, MS Office, HealtheAnalytics, Confluence.

BlueKC provides quality health services to financially vulnerable families and individuals covered by programs like Medicare and Medicaid. The project was to enhance their claim processing system by incorporating business rules to bring their Medicaid / Medicare claims system in compliance with the new ICD 10 codes and HIPAA 5010 EDI standards. Conducted controlled brainstorming sessions with project focus groups for collecting high-level business requirements. Conducted several Requirement Gathering Sessions for gaining detailed requirements and finalizing Business Requirement Document (BRD). Involved in data mapping, field mapping of the data elements responsible for the BRD. Performed GAP analysis of business rules, business and system process flows. Responsible for the full HIPAA compliance lifecycle from gap analysis, mapping, implementation and testing for Medicaid Claims. Worked on different modules like member enrollment, provider enrollment, coverage and programs. Claims and script creation knowledge for HRP Health Rules Payor and enrollment auto processing tool. Actively involved in updating internal processes (submit claims, check eligibility), updating data collection and data reporting for health plans like HMO, PPO, POS and EPO. Created reports using SAP Business Objects tool such as Designer, Desktop Intelligence. Requirement gathering, Business Process flow development, and Business Analysis. Extensively used Informatica to Extract, Transform and load data to perform any data validations. Developed Scripts for Regression Testing and System Testing. Created and maintained a project schedule using MS Project showing all target dates (deliverables). Creating data load and Upgrade scripts for data migrations, data formatting and data validations. Extracted the data from SQL Server, Oracle, Files, and Access into Data warehouse. Worked with the project manager for planning and organizing the project activities, and in communicating with other business center mangers and stakeholders of the project. Environment: Business Objects 6.5/XIR2/XIR 3.1/XI 4.0, Oracle, MS Project, MS Access, MS office 2010, Sql Loader, Agile, Informatica.

Worked on the below CVS - Aetna integration projects: Creating a functionality for a given plan to create multiple Network Pricing Profile (NPP) that identifies one NPP as ‘default’ and other NPPs as alternative based upon the state code created per Network Pricing Profile. Integrating Security Awareness between organizations which include centralizing the human risks, strategy, messaging and training material. Provided a capability that will enable consistent management of consumer profile, preferences, and consents to facilitate a common consumer experience across the enterprise. Environment: Agile, JIRA; HL7, Mainframe ; Business intelligence (BI), Business Objects (BO), Informatica 8, JAVA, Requisite Pro, MS Visio, MS Project, SQL, MS Access, MS Office.
